# NEUROCOGNITIVE FINDINGS

```{r}
#| label: include-domains
#| output: asis
#| echo: false

# Dynamically include domain files based on what's been generated
# Domain files follow the pattern _02-XX_domain.qmd
domain_files <- list.files(
  pattern = "^_02-[0-9]{2}_[a-z_]+\\.qmd$",
  full.names = FALSE
)

# Sort files by their numeric prefix to maintain order
domain_files <- domain_files[order(domain_files)]

# Generate include statements for each domain file
if (length(domain_files) > 0) {
  for (file in domain_files) {
    # Extract domain name from filename for section creation
    domain_name <- gsub("^_02-[0-9]{2}_(.+)\\.qmd$", "\\1", file)

    # Create the include statement
    cat(sprintf("\n{{< include %s >}}\n", file))
  }
} else {
  cat("\n*No domain files found. Please run the domain generation process.*\n")
}
```
